title: Robust serif
content:
I am attempting to determine if there is a base font for the grunge letters in Press Letter A Dirty Stamped Font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PressLetterOrigSM_5688.jpg)
  
 [http://wegraphics.net/downloads/http://wegraphics.net/downloads/press-le...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926/http:/wegraphics.net/downloads/http:/wegraphics.net/downloads/press-letter-a-dirty-stamped-font/ "http://wegraphics.net/downloads/http://wegraphics.net/downloads/press-letter-a-dirty-stamped-font/")  
I cleaned up the letters 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PressLetterSM_3665.jpg)
 and sent them to What the font which suggested FF Meta Serif Medium [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/meta-serif/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/meta-serif/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/meta-serif/") which is somewhat similar.  
I wonder if there is anything closer?  
Thanks  
Don

Font: 

 Merriweather 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PressLetterOrigSM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926/http:/typophile.com/files/PressLetterOrigSM.jpg) | 32.22 KB |
| [PressLetterSM.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926/http:/typophile.com/files/PressLetterSM.jpg) | 92.13 KB |
author: donshottype

comments.content:
Appears to be Merriweather, a free Google web typeface (and they realigned the non-aligning numerals when they adapted it):  
 [http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Merriweather](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317105926/http:/www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Merriweather "http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Merriweather")
I agree with Kevin - this is closest to Merriweather.

Seems like a match. Thanks Kevin.  
Don
